Wiimote Whiteboard Comparison

The Wiimote Whiteboard, created by Johnny Lee of Carnegie Mellon's HCI, is a DIY instantiation of electronic whiteboard's often seen in primary schools, universities and corporate settings.

I was asked to complete an assessment of the Wiimote Whiteboard against the school's electronic whiteboard solution. The video became popular amongst educators looking for a electronic whiteboard solution but who lacked funding to do so.
